
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


find_package(AIO REQUIRED)

add_library(module-bdev-aio INTERFACE)
target_link_libraries(module-bdev-aio INTERFACE
  AIO::aio
  spdk-lib-bdev
  spdk-lib-json
  spdk-lib-jsonrpc
  spdk-lib-log
  spdk-lib-rpc
  spdk-lib-thread
  spdk-lib-util
)

add_global_library_for(module-bdev-aio.global module-bdev-aio)
target_compile_options(module-bdev-aio.global PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(module-bdev-aio.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(module-bdev-aio.global PUBLIC
  AIO::aio
  spdk-lib-bdev
  spdk-lib-json
  spdk-lib-jsonrpc
  spdk-lib-log
  spdk-lib-rpc
  spdk-lib-thread
  spdk-lib-util
)
target_sources(module-bdev-aio.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/aio/bdev_aio.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/module/bdev/aio/bdev_aio_rpc.c
)
